001package Corner_Detection;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.Shape;
006import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
007import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
008import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
009import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
010import java.util.LinkedList;
011import java.util.List;
012
013import ij.IJ;
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.Roi;
016import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
017import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
018import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
019import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageGraphics;
020import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
021import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
022import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
024import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters;
025import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
026import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
027import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.MaxLocator.Method;
028
029public class Make_Corner_Test_Image2 implements PlugIn {
030        
031        static int width = 512;
032        static int height = 512;
033        
034        static int Nx = 5;
035        static int Ny = 5;
036
037
038        @Override
039        public void run(String arg) {
040
041                ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
042                ip.setColor(128);
043                ip.fill();
044                
045                
046                AffineTransform T = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(2.3, 0);
047                
048                int N = Nx * Ny;
049                
050                double dx = (double) width / (Nx + 1);
051                double dy = (double) height / (Ny + 1);
052                
053                double rectW = 30;
054                double rectH = 50;
055                
056                double deltaAngle = Math.PI / 2 / N;
057                
058                List<Shape> rectangles = new LinkedList<>();
059                
060                try (ImageGraphics g = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
061                        g.setColor(255);
062//                      g.setLineWidth(0);
063                        Graphics2D g2 = g.getGraphics();
064                        
065                        int k = 0;
066                        for (int j = 0; j < Ny; j++) {
067                                double y = dy * (j + 1);
068                                for (int i = 0; i < Nx; i++) {
069                                        double x = dx * (i + 1);
070                                        Shape rect = new Rectangle2D.Double(x - rectW/2, y - rectH/2, rectW, rectH);
071                                        double angle = deltaAngle * k;
072                                        AffineTransform R = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(angle, x, y);
073                                        Shape rectR = R.createTransformedShape(rect);
074                                        rectangles.add(rectR);
075                                        //listPoints(rectR);
076                                        g2.fill(rectR);
077                                        k++;
078                                }
079                        }
080                }
081                
082                Parameters params = new Parameters();
083                params.doCleanUp = false;
084                params.maxLocatorMethod = Method.QuadraticLeastSquares; //Method.Quartic; //Method.Parabolic; //Method.None; //
085                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
086                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
087                
088                CornerOverlay.DefaultMarkerSize = 3;
089                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
090                oly.strokeColor(Color.green);
091                oly.strokeWidth(1.0);
092                oly.addItems(corners);
093                
094                
095                // iterate over all rectangles
096                for (Shape r : rectangles) {
097                        //listPoints(r);
098                        List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(r);
099                        Roi roiR = makePolygon(rectPoints);
100                        roiR.setStrokeColor(Color.blue);
101                        roiR.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
102                        oly.addRoi(roiR, false);
103                        
104                        // find the closest corner for each rectangle point
105                        List<Point> cornerPoints = new LinkedList<>();
106                        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
107                                Point p = rectPoints.get(i);
108                                Corner c = findClosest(p, corners);
109                                cornerPoints.add(c);
110                        }
111                        
112                        Roi roiC = makePolygon(cornerPoints);
113                        roiC.setStrokeColor(Color.red);
114                        roiC.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
115                        oly.addRoi(roiC);
116                }
117                
118                
119                
120                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus("Corner Test", ip);
121                im.setOverlay(oly);
122                im.show();
123                im.saveRoi();
124                
125
126                //IJ.runPlugIn(Find_Corners_Harris.class.getName(), null);
127        }
128        
129        Shape makeTriangle(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2) {
130                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();      
131                poly.moveTo(x0, y0);
132                poly.lineTo(x1, y1);
133                poly.lineTo(x2, y2);
134                poly.closePath();
135                return poly;
136        }
137        
138        void listPoints(Shape s) {
139                IJ.log("rectangle: ");
140                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
141                double[] coords = new double[6];
142                int i = 0;
143                while (!pi.isDone()) {
144                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
145                        IJ.log("  " + Matrix.toString(coords));
146                        pi.next();
147                        i++;
148                }
149        }
150        
151        List<Point> getPoints(Shape s) {
152                List<Point> points = new LinkedList<>();
153                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
154                double[] coords = new double[6];
155                while (!pi.isDone()) {
156                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
157                        points.add(Point.create(coords[0], coords[1]));
158                        pi.next();
159                }
160                return points;
161        }
162        
163        Corner findClosest(Point p, List<Corner> corners) {
164                Corner minCorner = null;
165                double minDist = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
166                for (Corner c : corners) {
167                        double dist2 = p.distance2(c);
168                        if (dist2 < minDist) {
169                                minCorner = c;
170                                minDist = dist2;
171                        }
172                }
173                return minCorner;
174        }
175        
176        
177        ShapeRoi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
178                Point[] pa = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
179                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();
180                poly.moveTo(pa[0].getX(), pa[0].getY());
181                for (int i=1; i<pa.length; i++) {
182                        poly.lineTo(pa[i].getX(), pa[i].getY());
183                }
184                poly.closePath();
185                return new ShapeRoi(poly);
186        }
187
188}
